Typography

Build a hierarchy of information through the use of standard typography. Users will navigate content this way by scanning for large headlines and big type. All font sizing is set to ems and px. Icons can also be helpful in helping communicate a particular action to a user. Wirefy comes with Font Awesome ready for your use.

The typography can be changed and updated through the _typography.scss file. In fact, there are many more styles like hr

Headings

Wirefy includes styles for all of the header elements that are balanced and based on a scale.

HTML
<h1>Heading h1 - 60px</h1>
<h2>Heading h2 - 40px</h2>
<h3>Heading h3 - 24px</h3>
<h4>Heading h4 - 18px</h4>
<h5>Heading h5 - 18px</h5>
<h6>Heading h6 - 14px</h6>
Rendered HTML

Heading h1

Heading h2

Heading h3

Heading h4

Heading h5
Heading h6

Paragraphs

This is a paragraph. Paragraphs are preset with a font size (16px), line height(1.25) and spacing to create an overall rhythm. We can add a bit more content to this paragraph by typing some random nonsense here. Wrap strong around type to make it bold! You can also use em to italicize your words.

HTML
<p>This is a paragraph. Paragraphs are preset with a font size (16px), line height(1.25) and spacing to create an overall rhythm. We can add a bit more content to this paragraph by typing some random nonsense here. Wrap <strong>strong</strong> around type to make it <b>bold</b>! You can also use <em>em</em> to italicize your words.</p>

Links

Including a link within your paragraph is not uncommon. In fact, you probably have internal links and external links. These should include different styles.

HTML
<p>Including a link within your paragraph is not uncommon. In fact, you probably have <a href="">internal</a> links and <a href="http://example.com" rel='external'>external</a> links. These should include different styles.</p>

Blockquotes

Quoting blocks of content from another source within your document can be use for building creditability.

HTML
<blockquote>
  Details matter, it’s worth waiting to get it right.
  <cite>Steve Jobs</cite>
</blockquote>
Rendered HTML
Details matter, it’s worth waiting to get it right. Steve Jobs

Small

De-emphasizing inline or blocks of text

HTML
<small>© 2014 - Wirefy is an open sourced framework.</small>
Rendered HTML
© 2014 - Wirefy is an open sourced framework.
